body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good morning! You've reached Carter and Associates Law Firm. My name is Alan Sanchez. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Stephanie Garcia. I'm calling because there's an issue with my billing statement that I received. It's quite confusing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Stephanie. I'll do my best to help clarify any confusion. Can I start by getting your account number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's four seven eight nine two one three five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Stephanie. I have your account pulled up now. For verification purposes, could you please provide your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's January 12th, one nine eight six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thanks for verifying that for me. Now, I see the issue with your billing statement. It seems there was a mistake in the coding of one of the charges. We'll correct this immediately. Is there an email address we can send the updated statement to?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, I've made a note of that. You should receive the updated statement within twenty four hours. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that was everything. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Stephanie! And thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
